titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the vse of the bowe and the pike together in militarie discipline.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker printer of the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Oatlands: this twelfth day of August, in the ninth yeere of Our reigne ...
Arms 24; Steele notation: found idlenesse 2) them, pleasure.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
